alert.note: Alert for Drew; Lincoln (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 3:24PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Drew and southwestern Lincoln Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 323 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Star City, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Monticello... Star City... Tillar... Plantersville... Cane Creek State Park... Feenyville... Garrett Bridge... Calhoun... Cornerville... Florence... Enon... Tyro... Palmyra... Rose Hill... Selma... Collins... Garnett... Montongo... Rock Springs... Coleman... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CDT for southeastern Arkansas.
